item.title: Apple Mach-O

item.title: FSEvents
item.description: Intro Directory events only 10.5-10.6. File events since 10.7. Each record is assigned a name which is constucted the following way: hex(last_event_id + 1).

item.title: Apple Platform Security
item.description: Applications or even OS itself doesn’t know the keys that are protected by Secure Enclave. OS only sees Keychain, but the Security Enclave is separated.
